definitions.body: [[יִפְתַּח־אֵל]] ´[[ג]] Jos 19:14, Jos 19:27 perh. = Jotapata Jos:BJ iii. 7, 7; Rabbin. [[גופתתא]] Reland:Pal 816;—Tell Jefât Rob:BR iii. 107. Guêrin:Gal. i. 476 f. cf. Bd:Pal 243.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[־הַמֶּלַךְ]]´[[ג]] 2Ki 14:7 (Kt; Qr om. art.) 1Ch 18:12, 2Ch 25:11 = [[־מֶלַךְ]]´[[ג]] 2Sa 8:13, Ps 60:2 (title); S. of Dead Sea, in or bordering on Edom; el-Ghôr Rob:BR ii. 109.

definitions.body: [[הֶחָרָשִׁים]] ´[[ג]] 1Ch 4:14, Ne 11:35, appar. near Lod & Ono, NW. of Jerus., not far from the sea.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[גֵּי הִנּׁם]] Jos 15:8, Jos 18:16, Ne 11:30, [[גֵּי בֶן־הִנּׁם]] Jos 15:8, Jos 18:16, 2Ki 23:10 Qr (Kt ´[[גי בני ה]]) 2Ch 28:3, 2Ch 33:6, Je 7:31, Je 7:32, Je 19:2, Je 19:6, Je 32:35; valley SW. & S. of Jerus. (Rob:BR ii. 273 f.), where incense was burned, and children were offered in sacrifice to ‘Molech.’ Others identify with the Tyropæon valley, cf. RS:Sem. i. 353; vid. further [[הִנּׁם]], [[תּׂפֶת]].
